TopicTitle: Does anyone know If I could run ksp on the least functional laptop of all time?

Articles.Content:
I have this laptop with a debian based linux distro (called huayra) and this specs:
Intel N4020 CPU
Integrated graphics
8GB ram
I already installed the game and even by lowering every graphic option to the max I get insanely low fps. Is there anything I could try to make the game playable?

14 hours ago, Kapitalizing Every Word said:

I have this laptop with a debian based linux distro (called huayra) and this specs:
Intel N4020 CPU
Integrated graphics
8GB ram
I already installed the game and even by lowering every graphic option to the max I get insanely low fps. Is there anything I could try to make the game playable?

I assume there's no mods or anything?

If possible, you could try downgrading your KSP version.

If you're looking to find mods, I think there might be some that might help with performance.

Hope you get your game up and running

Also, you could take a look into cloud gaming

https://cloudbase.gg/g/kerbal-space-program/
